metrics_conclusion: Searching For Heaven has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Searching For Heaven is written in the key of F♯ Mixolydian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 11st most popular key among Mixolydian keys and     the 42nd most popular  among all keys. The F♯ Mixolydian scale is similar to the F♯ Major scale except that its 7th note (E) is a half step lower.  Mixolydian chord progressions are heavily featured in many genres of music like classic rock, which relies on the major chord built on the 7th scale degree. 

See the F♯ Mixolydian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
